wikipedia_page.main: John Morley Holford, CB, OBE (10 January 1909 – 4 November 1997) was a medical officer in the Royal Navy.

response: *Surgeon Rear-Admiral Sir John Holford (Royal Navy Medical Officer)
* Surgeon Rear Admiral John Holford CB, OBE (1909–1997) – medical officer in the Royal Navy; worked for the Ministry of Health, 1965–1974; later senior principal medical officer
